overview: Beach is a summary of conversations in Super 8 and Super 35mm that narrates, in a experimental way, the 21 year relationship of a couple up to ther separation. A reflection on how we decide to build our own memories, the testimony of a generation that lives creating memories to share and that feels nostalgia for memories they adapt from other generations, even. This short film is imagined as a memory or a dream that anyone could incorporate into their own memory.
title: Beach
